page.description: Get the port for an open socket. (R = remote port, L = local port)
page.discussion: The .PORT_GET() method returns the local or remote port that the socket is connected to.
page.example: dim s as P s = sockets.open("www.alphasoftware.com", 80, "C") ? s.port_get("L") 'local port = 18700 ? s.port_get("R") 'remote port = 80
